title: Lux & Mimi
body: Just curious why you guys didn't give Lux some sort of visual affects this year to add in her new familiar Mimi, I know you made a ward. I would at least been okay if Mimi joined her in her recall animation. I just think for Lux to have the very first Star Guardian skin, she deserve a bit of an update on VFX and Particles.

replies.body: Hmmmm it does feel a little weird that the OG SG doesn't even have her faithful companion! There's not a lot I can personally do (since I'm just a mere poro), but I'll be sure to pass that suggestion along!
